text:
The 17-day annual Saifai Mahotsava came to an end here with dazzling performances by Bollywood personalities even as the last day of the event was marred by clashes in which two policemen were injured and several vehicles damaged.

The event started with a controversy over Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Akhilesh Yadav’s absence at the inaugural session and ended on Monday night with several Bollywood celebrities performing at the event.

The event took an ugly turn with locals clashing with the police while jostling their way towards the venue to watch the star-studded show.

In the clash, four police jeeps and three OB vans of television news channels were damaged. A sub-inspector and a constable were also injured. The situation was, however, brought under control by the police. - PTI
title: Clashes mar Saifai Mahotsava
